title: React Native Developer
description:
I worked as a Front-end React, React Native developer and on the Back-end with Node.js for more specific corrections in BFF.

I developed features and corrections in the RD app (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=br.com.drogaraia&hl=pt_BR) and Grupo DPSP (https://www.grupodpsp.com.br/) and developed the cash register system for RD pharmacies.

I used the following technologies and libraries in my day-to-day work: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Typescript, React, React native, Node.js, GraphQL (Apollo Client), Next.js (SSR), Styled components, Tailwind and Unit tests (Jest/RTL) and Micro frontend.

I also worked with agile methodologies within the team. The one used in this experience was Scrum with the help of the Jira tool.

title: React Developer
description:
I worked as a Front-end developer using React as the main library.

I developed and maintained the ombudsman system for the financial cooperative Sicredi (https://www.sicredi.com.br/home/) using the following technologies and libraries: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Typescript, React, Zustand, Unit Tests (Jest), Styled Components, Tailwind, Strapi.

I also worked with agile methodologies within the squad. The one used in this experience was a combination of Kanban and Scrum, better known as SrumBan.

title: React Developer
description:
I was a Front-end developer using React as the main library.

I worked developing, maintaining, correcting and proposing solutions in the e-commerce systems of drogaraia (https://www.drogaraia.com.br/) and drogasil (https://www.drogasil.com.br/), using the following technologies and libraries: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Typescript, React, React Native, GraphQL (Apollo Client), Next.js (SSR), Styled components and Unit tests (Jest/RTL).

I and my squad also used the Kanban methodology to manage tasks and deadlines.

title: Front-end developer
description:
I worked as a Front-end developer using React in the internal cash register system of the Sicredi financial cooperative (https://www.sicredi.com.br/home/).

To deliver the work, I used HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, Typescript, React, Web components and jQuery (in the legacy version), in addition to the agile methodologies that used a mix of Kanban and Scrum, with most aspects of Kanban prevailing.

title: Front End Developer
description:
I worked as a Front-end React developer focusing on e-commerce systems.

In one of the projects (https://voltzmotors.com/), I used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, jQuery (for legacy), Sass, Less, Vtex (for e-commerce). For other projects, a similar technology stack was used.

Among the agile methodologies applied in the company, the most predominant was Kanban, but this depended on the project in question.

One of the projects developed: https://www.sharktankhub.com/
